member.name: T:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController
member.summary: Used to communicate with an Atrium Controller using Atrium SDK and HTTP.

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an AtriumController with no connections and requires "Open" to be called yet.

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an AtriumController object connected to the specified address under the specified username and password.
member.param: Username to log in as.
Password to log into Atrium under specified username
Atrium Controller Address to connect to

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.Open(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Opens a connection to the Atrium Controller with the given Username, Password, and Address (URI)
member.param: Username to the account with SDK access
Password to the account with SDK access
URI to the Atrium Controller's Web Software.
member.returns: Boolean value specifying whether the connection was successful or not.

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.OpenAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Asynchronously opens a connection to the Atrium Controller with the given Username, Password, and Address (URI)
member.param: Username to the account with SDK access
Password to the account with SDK access
URI to the Atrium Controller's Web Software.
member.returns: Boolean value specifying whether the connection was successful or not.

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.Close
member.summary: Closes the AtriumController's connection. If this function is called, the connection cannot be reopened.
member.returns: Boolean indicating whether the Controller closed the connection or not.

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.CloseAsync
member.summary: Asynchronously closes the AtriumController's connection. If this function is called, the connection cannot be reopened.
member.returns: Boolean indicating whether the Controller closed the connection or not.

member.name: P:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.MaxAttempts
member.summary: Maximum number of attempts to establish a session. (by default: 10. Maximum amount that can be set is 50.)

member.name: P:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.DelayBetweenAttempts
member.summary: The time in seconds to wait for the next attempt to log into the controller. (by default: 10 seconds)

member.name: P:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.Timeout
member.summary: Time for the HTTP Requests to live. If the connection is poor or big requests are expected, then Timeout should be higher.

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.ACCESS_LEVELS(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructs an integer array of the 5 integer arguments. If an argument is not provided, then that Access Level is ignored.
member.param: Integer that represents the Object ID for an Access Level. By default: -1 for no access level
Integer that represents the Object ID for an Access Level. By default: -1 for no access level
Integer that represents the Object ID for an Access Level. By default: -1 for no access level
Integer that represents the Object ID for an Access Level. By default: -1 for no access level
Integer that represents the Object ID for an Access Level. By default: -1 for no access level

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.To26BitCardNumber(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts two 32-bit integers into one 26-bit integer. Specifically used for converting a Family Number and Member Number into it's 26-bit variant, where the Family Number is the upper 10 bits and the Member Number is the lower 16 bits.
member.param: 10-bit Int32 that corresponds to the Family Number on the card.
16-bit Int32 that corresponds to the Member Number that belongs to the related family.
member.returns: 26-bit integer directly converted from the family number bits concatenated with the member number bits. If family number or member number is less than 0, then -1 is returned.

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.ToUTC(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Converts a DateTime to its UTC counterpart in Hexadecimal notation as a String
member.param: DateTime to convert to Hexadecimal UTC
member.returns: String representing UTC time of the datetime passed in. Is in Hexadecimal notation

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.FromUTC(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a UTC Hexadecimal String to its DateTime counterpart.
member.param: UTC String that is to be converted to a DateTime.
member.returns: DateTime representing local time of converted UTC string. If the String cannot be parsed, then default is returned.

member.name: P:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.IsConnected
member.summary: Specifies whether the Connection is currently up or not.

member.name: P:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.RequestText
member.summary: Stores the Request XML data to the last POST request made.

member.name: P:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.ResponseText
member.summary: Stores the Response String from the last POST response received.

member.name: P:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.EncryptedRequest
member.summary: Serial number of the Atrium Controller that the AtriumController object is connected to. Stores the Request XML data after encryption to the last POST request made.

member.name: P:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.EncryptedResponse
member.summary: Stores the Response XML data before decryption to the last POST response received.

member.name: P:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.SerialNumber
member.summary: Serial number of the Atrium Controller that the AtriumConnection object is connected to.

member.name: P:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.ProductName
member.summary: Product name of the Atrium Controller that the AtriumController object is connected to.

member.name: P:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.ProductLabel
member.summary: Product label of the Atrium Controller that the AtriumController object is connected to.

member.name: P:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.ProductVersion
member.summary: Product version of the Atrium Controller that the AtriumController object is connected to.

member.name: P:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.SessionID
member.summary: Session ID of the Atrium Controller that the AtriumController object is connected to.

member.name: P:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.SessionKey
member.summary: Session Key of the Atrium Controller that was computed using MD5(Serial Number (concatenated) Session ID #1)

member.name: P:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.FragmentSize
member.summary: Fragment size of HTTP Requests when using the GetAll method. The larger this variable is, the less efficient the GetAll method MAY run. If fragmentations are to be expected, then this drawback is worth it, but if fragmentations do not exist often or are small, then this number should be smaller. The smallest the fragment size can be is 25. (By default: 100)

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.Insert(ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.Objects.AtriumObject)
member.summary: Inserts a single Atrium Object into the controller.
member.param: Atrium Object to be inserted.

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.InsertAsync(ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.Objects.AtriumObject)
member.summary: Asynchronously nserts a single Atrium Object into the controller.
member.param: Atrium Object to be inserted.

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.Update(ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.Objects.AtriumObject)
member.summary: Updates a single Atrium Object into the controller. If the object does not exist (defined by GUID being equal) then no update occurs.
member.param: Object to be updated in the controller.
member.returns: True if the object was successfully updated. False otherwise.

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.UpdateAsync(ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.Objects.AtriumObject)
member.summary: Asynchronously updates a single Atrium Object into the controller. If the object does not exist (defined by GUID being equal) then no update occurs.
member.param: Object to be updated in the controller.
member.returns: True if the object was successfully updated. False otherwise.

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.Delete``1(ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.Objects.AtriumObject,System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a specified AtriumObject that exists in the Atrium Controller by ObjectID or ObjectGUID. This is first done by ID but if the specified AtriumObject does not have an ObjectID, then it will look for an ObjectGUID.
member.param: AtriumObject to delete from the Atrium Controller.
Size of how many records the GetAll function should grab per HTTP packet.
member.returns: Boolean value that represents whether the AtriumObjet, o, was deleted in the controller or not.

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.DeleteAsync``1(ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.Objects.AtriumObject,System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a specified AtriumObject that exists in the Atrium Controller by ObjectID or ObjectGUID. This is first done by ID but if the specified AtriumObject does not have an ObjectID, then it will look for an ObjectGUID.
member.param: AtriumObject to delete from the Atrium Controller.
Size of how many records the GetAll function should grab per HTTP packet.
member.returns: Boolean value that represents whether the AtriumObjet, o, was deleted in the controller or not.

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.GetAll``1(System.Int32)
member.summary: Grabs all objects of type T until a fragment result of a request results with No Used Objects. e.g. Objects 0-100 are all used, Objects 100-200 have 80 used and 20 deleted, Objects 200-300 have a mix of deleted and free... In the increment of 200-300, a list of count 0 would be constructed, which ends the process of grabbing more objects, returning what has already been grabbed. WARNING: Fragmentations larger than the default 100 may exist, if you believe your controller may have this case, please set the Fragment Size to a larger number.
member.typeparam: Type of AtriumObject to grab from the Atrium Controller.
member.param: Size of how many records the function should grab per HTTP packet.
member.returns: List of Atrium Objects that are in the Controller.

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.GetAllAsync``1(System.Int32)
member.summary: Grabs all objects of type T until a fragment result of a request results with No Used Objects. e.g. Objects 0-100 are all used, Objects 100-200 have 80 used and 20 deleted, Objects 200-300 have a mix of deleted and free... In the increment of 200-300, a list of count 0 would be constructed, which ends the process of grabbing more objects, returning what has already been grabbed. WARNING: Fragmentations larger than the default 100 may exist, if you believe your controller may have this case, please set the Fragment Size to a larger number.
member.typeparam: Type of AtriumObject to grab from the Atrium Controller.
member.param: Size of how many records the function should grab per HTTP packet.
member.returns: List of Atrium Objects that are in the Controller.

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.GetAllByIndex``1(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Grabs all records between the specified minimum and maximum object IDs in the controller.
member.typeparam: AtriumObject child that is to be grabbed from the Controller
member.param: Start index of what objects to grab from in the Controller.
End index of what objects to grab from in the Controller.
member.returns: List of the specified AtriumObject objects that were grabbed from the Controller.

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.AtriumController.GetAllByIndexAsync``1(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Grabs all records between the specified minimum and maximum object IDs in the controller.
member.typeparam: AtriumObject child that is to be grabbed from the Controller
member.param: Start index of what objects to grab from in the Controller.
End index of what objects to grab from in the Controller.
member.returns: List of the specified AtriumObject objects that were grabbed from the Controller.

member.name: T:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.Exceptions.FailedToLoginException
member.summary: Thrown when the UserID returned from the second Atrium Controller Answer is -1.

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.Exceptions.FailedToLoginException.#ctor
member.summary: Thrown when a login fails where it gets past all phases but the User ID returned is "-1".

member.name: T:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.Exceptions.HttpRequestException
member.summary: Thrown when an HTTP Request fails, usually when some encryption went wrong.

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.Exceptions.HttpRequestException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Thrown when an HTTP Request is made using Encryption but the Response did not contain expected Encryption variables.

member.name: T:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.Exceptions.IntegrityException
member.summary: Thrown when integrity is invalidated when checksums are compared between remote encrypted message and remote checksum

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.Exceptions.IntegrityException.#ctor
member.summary: Thrown when integrity is invalidated when checksums are compared between remote encrypted message and remote checksum

member.summary: Overriden ToString() to return FirstName concatenated with LastName separated by a space. (e.g. "John Doe").

member.name: T:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.Security.MD5
member.summary: Performs MD5 hash algorithm.

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.Security.MD5.Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Hashes the given string using MD5 algorithms.
member.param: String to be hashed
member.returns: Hashed string in hexadecimal

member.name: T:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.Security.RC4
member.summary: Performs RC4 Encryption/Decryption algorithms. Also includes a CheckSum calculator.

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.Security.RC4.Encrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts a given string with a given secret key. Secret key must be in hexadecimal.
member.param: Secret key to encrypt with
String to be encrypted
member.returns: Encrypted string in hexadecimal.

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.Security.RC4.Decrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts a given string with a given secret key. String and secret key must be in hexadecimal.
member.param: Secret key to decrypt with
String to be decrypted
member.returns: Decrypted string in ASCII

member.name: M:ThreeRiversTech.Zuleger.Atrium.REST.Security.RC4.CheckSum(System.String)
member.summary: Performs a Check Sum on the given string, str, where the checksum is the summation of all character codes rolling over 0xFFFF.
member.param: String to perform the check sum on.
member.returns: Returns a String formatted like "0x####" where #### is the summation of all character codes in str.
